name: test_repo_policy_enabled
description:
arrange: A working application with one runner with repo policy enabled.
    act: Dispatch a workflow.
    assert: Workflow run successfully passed.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: A working application with one runner with repo policy enabled.
act: Dispatch a workflow.
assert: Workflow run successfully passed.
